metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44758 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heimdal before 7.7.1 allows attackers to cause a NULL pointer dereference in a SPNEGO acceptor via a preferred_mech_type of GSS_C_NO_OID and a nonzero initial_response value to send_accept.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44758` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-clients-x - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-kcm - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-kdc - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-multidev - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-servers - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
heimdal-servers-x - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libasn1-8-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libgssapi3-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libhcrypto4-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libhdb9-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libheimbase1-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libheimntlm0-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libhx509-5-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libkadm5clnt7-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libkadm5srv8-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libkafs0-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libkdc2-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libkrb5-26-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libotp0-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libroken18-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libsl0-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
libwind0-heimdal - 1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the fix commit solely can cause build failures on tests, a follow-up commit to fix it should be 953d9442.

criterions.comment: heimdal package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6~git20131207+dfsg-1ubuntu1.2+esm3').
